system.sustained: Psyker fires a Psychic Bolt  at target individual which may be dodged as if a ranged attack. If not avoided it deals 1d10 +2*Psy Rating Explosive Damage with Shocking and Warp Weapon Qualities. The target suffers a -5*Psy Rating Penalty to their Toughness Test to resist the Shocking Quality. This attack does not determine hit location randomly, instead always hitting the head.
